attributes.action: Request that all Turkish mainlanders go back to Turkey including their troops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time they went back to their own country, stop the occupation and allow CYPRIOTS, both greek and Turkish speaking to go back to their traditional homes, and for foreign countries to stop meddling in the Islands affairs!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
